front.title: Face analysis technology evaluation (FATE) part 11

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This report summarizes the results of the FATE Quality Vector assessment track, which tests face image quality algorithmsâ€™ ability to detect specific defects such as non-frontal pose and background non-uniformity in the context of facial images. All algorithms submitted have some success at measuring various quality-related parameters.

seriesInfo.name: NISTIR; NIST IR; NIST interagency report; NIST internal report
